message.body: So, I'm just about done packing. If you're free this evening, would you like to grab a bite to eat somewhere?
(1/2)Hey sorry just saw this. I'm visiting my parents today, my dad just got out of the hospital after surgery(great year for them :/) You free any other
(2/2)evening before you leave? Nothing like making it a last second thing
If it doesn't work out, don't worry about it!
We're having dinner at 6, barring disaster, so... 8:15?
How about we say 9 to be safe. That way there is no rush or awkward overlap :)
How about a deal at 8:45? ;-) I just know that I can't go TOO late 'cause I need to get a little sleep
